formalpara.title: Verify the evolving Increment Test Plan and Usage Models work products in team reviews
formalpara.para: Conduct frequent certification team reviews of the evolving Increment Test Plan and Usage Models for completeness, consistency, correctness, and simplicity. Confirm through quantitative analysis of usage model properties, such as the long-run probabilities of state occurrence, that the models are consistent with user estimates and experience.

formalpara.title: Verify the completed Increment Test Plan and Usage Models work products with the customer and the project team
formalpara.para: Review the Increment Test Plan and Usage Models with the customer, the specification and certification teams, and affected peer groups to obtain agreement on them as the basis for software certification.
